text:
The following code does not work as expected in ant.

<dirset id="dirs" dir="." includes="*"/>
<property name="dirprop" refid="dirs"/>
<echo message="Dirs in ${basedir}: ${dirprop}"/>

It lists the files in the basedir.

This sounds too me like a real bug, and it is not fixed in SVN.
Fixing it would break BC, but sounds good.
What do other committers think about this one ?
